details:
The Asterisk project reports:

> Asterisk may crash when processing an incoming REGISTER
> request if that REGISTER contains a Contact header with
> a lengthy URI.
>
> This crash will only happen for requests that pass
> authentication. Unauthenticated REGISTER requests will
> not result in a crash occurring.
>
> This vulnerability only affects Asterisk when using
> PJSIP as its SIP stack. The chan\_sip module does not have
> this problem.
summary: asterisk -- Long Contact URIs in REGISTER requests can crash Asterisk
